New Records: Australia posted the highest-ever T20I total at the Adelaide Oval
Key Match Events: Glenn Maxwell scored a century (120 off 55 balls)
Post-Match Reflections: Mitchell Marsh praised Glenn Maxwell's performance
Rovman Powell credited Australia for bowling well and said they need to discuss their approach
Glenn Maxwell said he is confident and comfortable in the T20 format
Miscellaneous Highlights: The 3rd and final T20I will be played on 13th February
The match was a clinical performance from Australia
West Indies did give it a good go but it turned out to be a few too many for them
